sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for solvent evaporation using a rotary vacuum evaporator.
sections.scope: Applicable to concentration of solutions in the Pharmaceutical Chemistry laboratory.
procedure: Ensure the rotary evaporator is clean and properly assembled.
Transfer the solution into the evaporation flask.
Set the required temperature of the water bath.
Continue evaporation until solvent is removed.
Release vacuum, stop rotation, and remove the flask.
sections.precautions: Do not apply sudden vacuum. Ensure proper cooling water circulation.
